story:
Once upon a time, in a far-off kingdom, there was a young adventurer named Pomoro who is known for his thirst for adventure. He started his journey to Prospevil, a prosperous village in the Kingdom of Vefurata.

Pomoro set out on his journey, feeling excited to embark on this new adventure. To the forest of Vefurata.
As he walked through the forest, Pomoro saw a mushroom humanoid in front of the house. She stood worried and looked shy.

Ohh, emm.. Hi there...
Ifuly look so embarrass and go inside her house.

Pomoro saw some movement among the trees, and dared himself to investigate what that motion is.

To his surprise, Pomoro saw a familiar sight. He saw three young mushrooms.

It reminded him of Ifuly.
